endpoints.description: Retrieve a summary of evaluation methods and criteria utilized by the service.
Provide patient details and obtain an initial health risk assessment.
Fetch personalized lifestyle recommendations based on evaluation results.
Access categorized information about potential health conditions the service evaluates.
Submit feedback on the received recommendations to improve future evaluations.
Review the history of previous assessments conducted for a patient.
Delete a specific assessment record by its unique identifier.
Generate statistical reports based on anonymized aggregated assessment data.
Configure and manage health care notifications and reminders for the patient.
Discover the latest updates regarding health care guidelines and preventive measures.
